treatments_requested.name: Medical Transportation Services
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Transport with skilled nursing services and ventilator management

guidelines_details: The services were necessary for treatment of the patient’s emergency medical condition.
soc_details: The patient required skilled nursing services during the flight due to intensive care needs.
rationale: The services were necessary for treatment of the patient’s emergency medical condition, including management of ventilator settings during the flight.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in neurology, actively practicing, expert in the treatment of the enrollee’s medical condition.
